item.title: Querying SELinux policy for boolean information
item.description:
Within an SELinux policy, certain access vectors (permissions) can be conditionally granted based on the value of a SELinux boolean.

To find the list of SELinux booleans that are available on your system, you can use the getsebool -a method, or semanage boolean -l. The latter also displays the description â€¦
